workflow.title: XDR-1279-End to End Test Case (Publish, Republish and Install)

properties.name: Publish install WF having Module target test status
Republish and install latest Version Xchange Manager test status
Republish and install latest Version -- Tenant Admin test status
Xchange Manager2 Token
properties.description: This is to fetch the Global Exchange ID when is Submitted by Xchange Manager1

UseCase1 -

Tenant Admin -- Create a Workflow and Submit Exchange 
Approve from Tenant Admin -- Which should Fail 
Install and Then Approve from the Xchange manager 
Install in the Other Tenant and run wf and uninstall
Modified wf and republish and install the latest wf version
Unpublish the Excahnge and Delete Exchange and Delete WF 

UseCase 2 -- 

Xchange Manager -- Create a Workflow and Submit Exchange 
Approve from Xchange Manager  (from Same tenant where it submitted 
Install in the Other Tenant and run wf and uninstall
Modified wf and republish and install the latest wf version
Unpublish the Excahnge and Delete Exchange and Delete WF
properties.display_name: XDR-1279-End to End Test Case (Publish, Republish and Install)

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)
